general.gigTitle: be a wordpress developer, or website builder to create wordpress website design

sellerCard.oneLiner: Be strong your online presence with a WordPress and Wix expert
sellerCard.description:
Hello, Fiverr Community!

I'm Iftikhar Hossain, a professional WordPress Website developer, and Wix expert. I have built many user-friendly WordPress and Wix websites for various people and businesses, such as e-commerce, real estate, blogs, listings, and Wix Online Store.

You can expect a professional, attractive, secure, and SEO-optimized website by choosing my services. So why are you waiting for that? Let's get started with creating your dream website with my expertise.

Best Regards,
Iftikhar

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional WordPress developer or web-site builder to create a functional, responsive wordpress web-site?


If yes, then you have come to the right place!


This is Iftakhar, a professional WordPress Web-site builder who can create an eye-catching responsive WordPress site from scratch or revamp an existing WordPress web-site based on your requirements.



Here are the services I provide:


  • Functional Web-site Design and Development
  • Fully Responsive (Mobile+Desktop) Design
  • Attractive Layout with Color Combination
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • SEO-friendly & Speed Optimization
  • Setup Payment Gateway
  • Theme Customization
  • Opt-in form
  • Autoresponder integration
  • Hosting setup
  • Social Media Integration
  • Web-site Transfer to Another Domain or Hosting



Why Choose My Gig:


  • High-Quality Work
  • 100% Client Satisfaction
  • Quick Response
  • 30 Days of Free Support After the Delivery
  • Unlimited Revisions until Satisfied



Simply select the package that best meets your requirements and place your order today - I'll deliver results, not excuses. 


If you still have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me. I'm always happy to answer them.

slide.name: be a wordpress developer, or website builder to create wordpress website design

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need your WordPress hosting and Cpanel login credentials to get started. Also, provide me with your reference website links or design and content of your website, including text, logo, images, videos, etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you redesign an existing WordPress web-site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can redesign an existing WordPress website based on your instructions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my web-site be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will design your website super responsive and mobile-friendly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer support after completing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer 30 days of free support after completing the order.

packageList.title: Basic 1 Page Website
packageList.description: Design or redesign 1 page WordPress website/Landing Page website design

packageList.title: Standard 5 Pages Website
packageList.description: Design or redesign 5 pages Responsive WordPress website With 30 Days of Free Support

packageList.title: Premium 8 Pages Website
packageList.description: Design or redesign 8 pages Responsive website + eCommerce Functionality + 30 Days Free Support

openGraph.title: be a wordpress developer, or website builder to create wordpress website design

reviews.comment: Great value for the money. Team was (and continues to be) very responsive and helpful throughout the whole process.  Went over and above expectations and genuinely care about the finished product. Highly recommended as a great value option with a talented team to get it done.

seller_response.comment: Customer Satisfaction is my first priority, Thank you so much and best of luck.

reviews.comment: The task was to bring to Wordpress a simple single page photoshop designed website. The photoshop file was reviewed and accepted before quoting the job. It took 10 reviews to get to final result due to severe lack of attention over simple details. Final result is acceptable but not perfect (I had to let go, my time and patience was over). Sorry for the bad review but its an honest one.
I was very specific and Iftakhar was very patient with me. I really appreciated him and his team. Highly recommend

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure to work with you. Waiting for the next work with you.

reviews.comment: Very helpful and kind. Happy to make revisions as well which I appreciate it.

seller_response.comment: Thanks for the kind and Inspiring words, your words make me work even harder.

reviews.comment: He completely exceeded my expectation in all areas.  I have plans to work with him for two additional projects.

seller_response.comment: Thanks very much for the Tip!! Really appreciated. Looking forward to the next order.
